topics.body:
I'm feeling really introspective tonight for some reason.

Do you ever feel as though that the world would be a much better place if people just stopped trying to prove that they were "good" people and instead focused on doing good unto others rather than trying to earn the title of a "good" person?  Wouldn't that mean the root of all evil isn't money, but rather the desire to prove one's self to be good?  "Every villain is a hero in his own mind" -Tom Hiddleston
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body: Crab is the fucking hardest thing to eat!
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976

topics.body: Okay so interstellar is fucking awesome. The instant I realized there was no sound outside the ship and they rotated it to create artificial gravity my mind was just in "FUCKING SCIENCE BRUH" mode.
topics.author: 500b587e7f123b1f230014a9

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54781ece6368722e4e950100#post_54781ece6368722e4e950100

Considering everything can be reduced to either "This guy will affect me positively or negatively". I don't see it working.

Simply put, there is no such thing as good or evil, just actions and reactions that affect an individual in a positive or a negative.

It's not about a guy being the hero or the villain, is what turns out to be more convenient for the people that's gonna be affected.

So no, that is never going to happen as long as we're emotional beings. Many need those thoughts much like some need to know/believe there is someone in the clouds watching them or there is something beyond the grave.

People need heroes and villains because otherwise, they get overwhelmed.
topics.author: 4fdfbf92945b7075d50036e4

topics.body:
Once I die, I want my body to be creminated and scattered into the emptiness of space.

That way, I can be in multiple places at once.
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976

topics.body: I wish science can find us a way to abolish the need for sleep.
topics.author: 4fde5cee945b700a970060fc

topics.body:
"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5478238663687218e8710200#post_5478238663687218e8710200

topics.body:
"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5478241563687203b73e0200#post_5478241563687203b73e0200
But naps are nice
What would all the unemployed teddy bears and pillows do if we got rid of sleep?
topics.author: 500b587e7f123b1f230014a9

topics.body:
"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5478238663687218e8710200#post_5478238663687218e8710200

I wish to be cremated, then have my ashes buried after a Viking funeral.

Yes, I want my ashes to have a funeral worthy of Asgard
topics.author: 4fdfbf92945b7075d50036e4

topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/547824576368724ca4f80100#post_547824576368724ca4f80100
Imagine having your body buried in an asteroid.
Fly a spaceship to one, make a hole, bury the body, leave.
Wherever that asteroid goes, I shall follow.
